amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike "printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution" and insert "numbered 1 for printing in the Congressional Record pursuant to clause 8 of rule XVIII.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Dreier.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
